import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# Q6: Recomendations of Target Demographics
I would recommend targeting the age demographics of 10-29 as they purchased the most amount of cookies. Also, females bought more cookies than males, so targeting females may increase sales.

# Q5: Recomendations of Cookie Type
I would recommend selling chocaolate chip and macadamia cookies primarily as they were the most popular with 12 and 16 repsectivly. I would not sell slated caramel or mint as they were less popular with 2 and 4 repsectivly. I would keep selling the others as the data is too small to rule them out with the value of 6.
